file_content.text: Please don't speak; your end of the line isn't secure. Call me Agent Reeho; I'm with Republic SIS.
The Chevin Conglomerate is a group of unscrupulous thugs. I believe their "Grand Acquisitions Race" is actually a cover for a bigger plot. But I need data.
Several Chevin just arrived from offworld. Please, take the listening device attached to this transmitter and plant it nearby. See what they say.
Help me, and I'll help you "acquire" some of the items on your list. You'll be duly compensated. Reeho, signing off.
There. The Senator's private line belongs to us. Now, your report shall be given.
I sent you a blasted report yesterday. There's no sign yet; believe me, I'm looking.
An unacceptable situation. The fleet could arrive momentarily. An opportunity may be missed!
What "fleet"? This is bigger than I thought. We need to dig deeper.
Hmm. Tracking Derester; that scum carries packages for Chevin slavers. Maybe you can "persuade" him to cough up some information? I'll be in touch.
Agent Reeho here. I've been studying the data you got from Derester, and admiring how you handled him.
According to Derester's intel, several Chevin High Acquisitors are meeting on Nar Shaddaa. There's got to be answers there.
If you could listen in on that meeting, without being seen, we could crack this thing wide open. If you're game, notify me when you're in position.
You're sadly mistaken. And this pathetic scavenger hunt won't buy any good graces.
Your impoverished Empire cannot even offer enrichment opportunities to your own people. The Conglomerate can, and will.
He sulks, to no end. With the ideograms traded and mastered, the Conglomerate's own enrichment approaches.
So, the Empire's interested too. But, those "ideograms" the Chevin mentioned... I can look into that.
Listen. Please, don't give those items to the Chevin. Place them in Republic custody; I have a dead drop that's secure. But we can't let them fall into Chevin hands.
I need to complete my investigation. If my suspicions are right... I'll keep you informed.
